alert.note: Alert for Allen; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 3:42PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Putnam, Paulding, Van Wert and west central Allen Counties through 430 PM EST... At 342 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ohio City to 8 miles east of Geneva. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Van Wert, Delphos, Paulding, Spencerville, Antwerp, Payne, Continental, Convoy, Ottoville, Ohio City, Spencerville In Allen County, Middlebury, Middle Point, Fort Jennings, Grover Hill, Willshire, Dupont, Scott, Melrose and Haviland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for west central Ohio.
